attributes.name: hash
attributes.description: The encoded blurhash, as a string.

attributes.name: resolutionX
attributes.description: The X-axis resolution in which the decoded image will be rendered at. Recommended min. 32px. Large sizes (>128px) will greatly decrease rendering performance.

attributes.name: resolutionY
attributes.description: The Y-axis resolution in which the decoded image will be rendered at. Recommended min. 32px. Large sizes (>128px) will greatly decrease rendering performance.

properties.name: hash
properties.description: The encoded blurhash, as a string.

properties.name: resolutionX
properties.description: The X-axis resolution in which the decoded image will be rendered at. Recommended min. 32px. Large sizes (>128px) will greatly decrease rendering performance.

properties.name: resolutionY
properties.description: The Y-axis resolution in which the decoded image will be rendered at. Recommended min. 32px. Large sizes (>128px) will greatly decrease rendering performance.
